ehi di disthrikka 12k karata kara satanaka niyalunu athara kusal perera, yashodha lanka saha harsha kure eeye shathaka wartha karamin thama disthrikkaya jayagrahanaya kara gena giya kridakayin bawata pathwuha.kurunagala â€“ siyallanma dawi lakunu 169 (panduwara 34.4): anuruddha rajapaksha 27, mithun jayawikrama 29, dhanushka dharmasiri 29, akila dhananjaya 3/12, mohomad shiras 3/24.kagalla â€“ kadulu 2k dawi lakunu 173 (panduwara 20.3): kusal janith perera 105, awishka pranandu 47*.hambanthota â€“ kadulu 9k dawi lakunu 232 (panduwara 50): pathum nissanka 60, shenal da silwa 52*, damindu ashan 36, roshan jayathissa 2/33, lakshan jayasinha 3/38, chalana da silwa 3/23.galla â€“ kadulu 4k dawi lakunu 233 (panduwara 34): yashodha lanka 143*, shalika karunanayaka 42, ruchira silwa 2/49.sampurna warthawa: kusal janithgen pita pitama shathaka dekaksinhayan parada jaya wyaghrayantajaya paraduma depasatama dolanaya wunu shri lanka â€“ bangaladesha dewani test krikat tharagaye awasan dinaye di jayagrahanaya thaman sathu karagannata bangaladesha wyaghrayin samath wiya.
